awd_titl_txt: The Project to Establish and Support a Connection Between   the Computer Network at Saint Vincent College and the NSFNet
awd_abstract_narration: 9402259  Steinhaus  St. Vincent College requests support from NSF for connection of its  campus network to PREPnet.  PREPnet is the midlevel network located  in the state of Pennsylvania.  PREPnet will provide operations  management and information services and it will give St. Vincent  College connection to the NSFNET, a high speed (1.5 - 45 million  bits per second) National Backbone network.    The College needs greater functionality and network speed to be  able to access supercomputers, libraries, and make file transfers  along with being able to implement a more reliable mail system.  Students and faculty research will benefit from the link.  This is  also a unique opportunity for the school to explore innovative  educational resources.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Computer and Information Science and Engineering
org_div_long_name: Division Of Computer and Network Systems
